This is fixed with the change in
<a href=""https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-45464"" class=""jira-issue-macro-key issue-link""  title=""Resources: Lost ability to Add Web Links"" >

.

",94816,557058:093e0ced-45f4-4932-853a-c54031e22f52,"Thu, 27 May 2021 13:25:08 -0400","

Tested on 22x: https://trunk-mysql.nightly.sakaiproject.org/, build: eaf9fc24
The button is disabled unless the form is correctly filled out. There are no error messages for validation.

Will set this to verified. If error messages should display, (I think it can only happen focus leaves the textbox now since the button is disabled if the form is not properly filled out), I can create a new Jira for this.

",128265,5d275d132c5a110c1d476990,"Wed, 7 Jul 2021 07:17:56 -0400","

Yes, if the button is disabled for a reason that is not obvious to the user (in this case, an invalid URL), there needs to be an alert on the page to tell you why it is disabled. Also, an instruction for the user to fix the issue. For example:
Alert: The link URL is invalid. Please check that your URL includes http:// or https:// and the correct link text, e.g., https://www.sakailms.org
I would expect this message to appear on removing focus from the URL field and have role=alert so it is read to a screen reader user.

Ideally, the sample link text should be specified via sakai property (so institutions can replace with their own institutional homepage for example).

",,,,,"Wed, 24 Jun 2020 09:44:11 +0000",[CHART] Time in Status,customfield_10025,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:timeinstatus,144949,70121:fbb7b515-e767-4033-9ad8-f4f033da3b40,"Wed, 7 Jul 2021 07:18:52 -0400","

Hi all,
Can we revisit this? Or perhaps another Jira is needed ... not sure.
Now, in 20.x, 21.x, and 22.x, if a user inputs a URL without the *http://* prefix, the ""Add Weblinks Now"" button becomes disabled.

But of critical importance here: there is no indication, tool tip, or error message indicating to the user why it's disabled. I think this is needed here, as I suspect many users won't be able to figure this out.

+1 to Tiffany's suggestion above.

",178248,557058:cdae778f-fe7d-4a6d-9667-9be789e4fbee,"Wed, 7 Jul 2021 07:31:33 -0400",

Please open a new JIRA ticket.

,78046,5ecebc1ca04d9c0c22055278,"Fri, 9 Jul 2021 05:34:56 -0400","

Tested on Server 20.0 and 21.0 The above mentioned issue of http:// and https:// persists. On server 20.0  and 21.0 able to add only one link. The button is enabled only when a valid url and a name is present. When trying to add web links with any other combination along with the valid entry un-enables the button. There should be ideally a tool tip suggesting the url is invalid or input name etc according  to  the issue present.

This is not morpheus, we only need to add to the .properties files the right text.

[SAK-30939] "Move to Trash" confirmation/cancel options are confusing,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30939,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

When you trash a resource, you get a confirmation message ""Are you sure you want to move the following item(s) to the trash?"" This is a yes or no question. The interface does not provide yes or no options. There is text asking you to ""remove confirmation"" which is confusing, and then you can click ""remove"" or ""cancel"". This is supposedly moving something to the trash, and while it is, arguably a removal, that's not the language initially presented. So the options should be ""yes/no"", ""yes/cancel"", or ""move to trash/cancel"" for less confusion.

https://duke.box.com/s/wxex5zli2ld6l87or52rjxsj7ub6ga0o

Compose window: Messages / Compose (Messages is clickable to reset tool - Good)

Folder Settings: Messages - Folder Settings (Not clickable - should be ""Messages / Folder Settings"")
New Folder: Messages - Create Folder (Not clickable - should be ""Messages / New Folder"")
Messages Settings: Messages - Settings (Not clickable - should be ""Messages / Settings"")
Messages Permissions: Permissions (Not clickable - should be ""Messages / Permissions"")

[SAK-36480] Importing exported assessment containing hyperlink to resources causes exception,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-36480,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

When importing an assessment containing a hyperlink to a file in resources which was previously exported and imported an exception is thrown.
I was able to reproduce this bug on 10.x and 11 nightly mysql builds.
2) Create a new assessment and add a question.
3) In the question text add a hyperlink to the file in resources.
4) Export the assessment using Content Packaging.
6) Export the copy of the imported assessment, again using content packaging.

8) Exception thrown.

",40364,557058:7074e357-325c-4f04-880f-321ecd7c7dc5,"Thu, 28 Apr 2016 09:40:37 -0400","

Thanks for reproducing this in Sakai 10. That argues for not making it a blocker, but generally if an exception is thrown to the user it is automatically considered a blocker.

",174474,557058:7074e357-325c-4f04-880f-321ecd7c7dc5,"Mon, 2 May 2016 06:43:47 -0400","

Sakai Jira review team decided that this is not a blocker because it is more of an edge case and there are best practices either for including the attachment directly, or to use the site copy feature (or these might be considered workarounds). Degraded to critical (it's still very bad for a user ever to experience a stack trace, but with respect to the 11.0 release, there are higher priority issues).

",,Depend,45323,SAK-31794,is depended on by,10007,35618,Screen Shot 2016-11-15 at 16.10.22.png,29767,ug:2691f961-d029-4ce9-a327-085187ecfa52,"Tue, 15 Nov 2016 05:11:05 -0500",74204,6164f496c669a60069cc6981,"Mon, 2 May 2016 23:05:39 -0400","

Adam, sure will do.

",191173,557058:48227012-f9a6-40a4-97e6-94c8ef57f33e,"Tue, 3 May 2016 09:15:00 -0400","

My question: why is this an important enough feature to require more UI clutter?

When would I want to drag-and-drop files but not overwrite the existing files?

",57389,557058:5e9b51e2-3d91-4079-943a-ed719d119ea1,"Wed, 4 May 2016 01:05:09 -0400","

Indeed Sam! Currently (in 10) when you drag and drop a resource with the same name, a new version is created. We dont want this behaviour so propose adding a new 'overwrite' option which is ticked by default.
We could effectively do without the explicit ""overwrite"" option and change the default behaviour but that would be confusing to users who are used to the current way of working.

I dont think that it will add too much clutter to the UI. The drag and drop page is fairly simple so can take the addition of a new option.

",157864,557058:48227012-f9a6-40a4-97e6-94c8ef57f33e,"Wed, 4 May 2016 05:41:35 -0400","

I am -1 on the proposed new option. My belief is 99% of users want or are okay with the default behavior. If others believe that this is a widely-desired feature, I'm happy to reconsider.

",191181,557058:5e9b51e2-3d91-4079-943a-ed719d119ea1,"Wed, 4 May 2016 06:35:42 -0400","

I'm confused, the default behaviour is to NOT overwrite existing files yet you say ""When would I want to drag-and-drop files but not overwrite the existing files?""

",,,,,,Relate,,,,,,54082,SAK-33536,is related to,10008,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,10733,Verified,"

1. In Resources, use Drag and Drop to upload new versions of existing files. Do this when there are files in a sub folder and a mixture of files to be overwritten and files that dont exist.
2. Select the option to 'Overwrite existing files'.

3. Check that the original file has been overwritten with the new version.

",[CHART] Date of First Response,customfield_10024,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:firstresponsedate,featurelist,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,74218,557058:48227012-f9a6-40a4-97e6-94c8ef57f33e,"Wed, 4 May 2016 06:41:44 -0400","

I thought you said a new version of the same file was created (""drag and drop a resource with the same name, a new version is created."")

",74219,557058:5e9b51e2-3d91-4079-943a-ed719d119ea1,"Wed, 4 May 2016 07:08:36 -0400","

Currently if there's a document ""file.doc"" in resources and you use drag and drop to upload a new version of ""file.doc"" you will end up with 2 files ""file.doc"" and ""file-1.doc"" in Resources.

We think this is wrong and that's what this patch is addressing.

[SAK-30920] Double escaped character in title string.,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30920,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

Site title shows double escaped charaters in title.
The method getUserSpecificSiteTitle is returning title escaped but is also escaped later. I think you need to create another method to avoid escape characters and call it during title construction.
Looking at source code for the example in the screenshot you'll see this:
The site title (not the tool title) is double escaped, and is because this method is escaping the returned value.
I think the easy way is returning value without escaping it, and add another method to return the value escaped to call it from here:

https://github.com/sakaiproject/sakai/blob/master/portal/portal-impl/impl/src/java/org/sakaiproject/portal/charon/site/PortalSiteHelperImpl.java#L433-L434

[SAK-30906] Newly added favorites should show up below existing favorites in the "Organize Favorites" menu,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30906,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

From SAK-30334's comments:

Jeff and I just noticed that, currently, when you add a new site to favorites, it shows up by default at the very top of the ""Organize Favorites"" menu (and will therefore appear in the first slot when the modal is closed).

This should probably be the reverse - newly added favorites should show up below existing favorites in the ""Organize Favorites"" menu, which would mean that they appear to the right of existing favorites in the sites row.

<a href=""https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-34938"" class=""jira-issue-macro-key issue-link""  title=""Save media (audio) uploads to Content Hosting rather than the database"" >
added a new property to trigger a conversion of samigo media files from the database to the file system.
The conversion runs on startup when triggered with
`samigo.convertMedia = true` in sakai.properties (or by another property
mechanism). This uses batching to be safe for restarts or multiple
nodes. Records are processed in batches of 10. If a batch is
interrupted, records may be left with the value of ""CONVERTING"" in the
location field. To reinitiate these, that field should be set to null

for those records.

",Duplicate,,,,10002,,,,,,57418,5eb012f0b882f90bae453e0f,"Mon, 9 May 2016 22:06:36 -0400","

I've tested several versions of elFinder and the problem is not reproducible.
Also i've tested the connector independently from Sakai (https://github.com/bluejoe2008/elfinder-2.x-servlet) and it's working fine.

So...seems the problem is in the Sakai side, but to be honest i'm very lost!

",40521,557058:1126cb77-b601-4bf1-a169-76deaba72266,"Tue, 14 Jun 2016 01:21:06 -0400","

I can reproduce this, the reason for the bug is that the returned data doesn't include a mime type and so it doesn't get displayed. Adding a mime type to the returned data gets it displayed in testing.

The reason for the mime type being missing is that when the directory is created no trailing slash is specified and when the mime type lookup is done it needs the trailing slash.

",57519,557058:1126cb77-b601-4bf1-a169-76deaba72266,"Tue, 14 Jun 2016 01:22:14 -0400","

Also if you create the folder as ""testing/"" it all works.

[SAK-33055] Sections/Group dropdown should only show groups TA can see,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-33055,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

Split out from GIT2-1365:
Currently, the TA's section/group filter dropdown shows as ""All Sections/Groups,"" regardless of which section(s) the TA has access to:
I think we had discussed the following:

If the TA does not have grade or view access to all sections/groups, this filter should reflect the sections/groups to which they do have access. So, for example, if a GB has 4 sections, and the TA has access to grade section 001 and view section 002, then the filter should default to ""Available Sections/Groups"" with the dropdown options showing the sections/groups. I think that'll clarify this a bit.

And, if the TA has grade/view access for only one section/group, I don't think there needs to be a dropdown at all. It can just say ""Section 001 - Showing 7 Students"". Does that make sense?

[SAK-30895] Email notification not received for creator of group announcement.,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30895,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

When an instructor/owner creates an announcement that is only available to a particular group that they are not a member of, they do not receive an email when the Email Notification - High All Participants is selected for that announcement.

column2: • In a site that has groups available, create and post an announcement with the following selected:

column1: Display this announcement to selected groups only
From the list of groups, select one in which you are NOT a member

column2: • Check email to verify that no message was received regarding the group announcement.

column1: Permissions for maintain has Access all group announcements checked.

In 10.2 whomever created the announcement received notification if High All Participant was selected regardless if they were in the group or not.

","http://qa01-sakai.marist.edu:8080/portal

[SAK-30894] Date displayed on Announcements Reorder page is inconsistent.,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30894,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

On the Announcements Reorder page, the date that is displayed appears to be the date that the announcement was created or last modified. However, if the announcement was configured using Specify Dates and the Beginning date is a date in the future, the Beginning date and time is what's displayed on the Reorder page.

column2: • In the Announcements tool, create two announcements, one right after the other, without using the Specify Dates option under Availability.
• Create a third announcement, right after the 2nd but this time, select Specify Dates under the Availability section.
• Check the box beside Beginning and enter a date in the future (do not use the day that the announcement is created).
• Create a 4th announcement, without using the Specify Dates option right after creating the 3rd announcement.
• Date displaying for Announcement #3 is the date in the future specified as the Beginning date.

column1:
The attached screenshot shows the Reorder page when Sort by Modified Date is selected. The sort is correct but the date displaying for #3 is the beginning date, not the date the announcement was created.

","http://qa01-sakai.marist.edu:8080/portal

[SAK-37508] wrap long words,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-37508,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

With narrower columns, I've been getting various reports about stuff overlapping the next column. One thing needed to help with that is to make sure the long words (e.g. URLs) with no spaces are broken if they don't fit. This should be a one-line CSS change, but as usual it's not so easy. Firefox and Edge like to expand DIVs beyond the boundary of the column, thus avoiding doing the break. So we need the two obvious properties plus mix-width: 100% in a couple of places.

",,49452,SAK-37508,wrap long words,10007,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10303&avatarType=issuetype,Bug,10002,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/priorities/major.svg,Major,10025,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/statuses/generic.png,Indicates QA is complete and an issue has been tested and verified (Migrated on 12 Oct 2021 03:05 UTC),Verified,3,done,green,10000,Fixed,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,Charles Hedrick,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,Charles Hedrick,"Wed, 20 Apr 2016 07:28:28 -0400","Wed, 18 Apr 2018 03:29:27 -0400",11.0,Lessons,0,1,Development,customfield_10000,com.atlassian.jira.plugins.jira-development-integration-plugin:devsummarycf,Rank,0|108zj4:,customfield_10019,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-lexo-rank,Sprint,customfield_10020,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-sprint,"Wed, 20 Apr 2016 07:35:06 -0400",,,,,,,[CHART] Time in Status,customfield_10025,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:timeinstatus,,,,,,11.0,12.0,107715,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,"Wed, 20 Apr 2016 07:31:52 -0400","

To test, create text in Add Text with one word that's longer than a column.
However titles of items have additional complications, so you should also create a title for an item that is too long for the column.

[SAK-30893] Deleted event in series reappears,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30893,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

After deleted a single occurrence of an event in a series, the event reappears.
1. Login to Sakai as an instructor.
2. Navigate to a course site with the Calendar tool added.
3. In the Calendar tool, click Add Event
4. Create a weekly (repeating) event that begins in the near future and ends several months away
5. Set the event length to an hour
6. Add an attachment to the event
8. Navigate to an event in the series created, click on the event
10. Select ""Delete only this occurrence"" from the drop-down menu

12. Event disappears but reappears after 15 minutes (approximately)

","http://qa01-sakai.marist.edu:8080/ (QA01 - TRUNK - Sakai 11-SNAPSHOT) - Server qa01-sakai), Mac OS X Yosemite 10.10.5, Chrome Version 49.0.2623.112 (64-bit)

Issues which are closed can be reopened.",Closed,3,done,green,10000,Fixed,6164df29a707100069fcdfd6,kyleblythe,6164e7b0a707100069fd3655,Raúl Sánchez Vegas,"Wed, 20 Apr 2016 03:00:58 -0400","Mon, 14 Aug 2017 08:34:57 -0400",12.0,Gradebook,0,1,Development,customfield_10000,com.atlassian.jira.plugins.jira-development-integration-plugin:devsummarycf,Rank,0|10aqnc:,customfield_10019,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-lexo-rank,Sprint,customfield_10020,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-sprint,"Mon, 3 Oct 2016 00:23:10 -0400",,,,,,,[CHART] Date of First Response,customfield_10024,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:firstresponsedate,,,,,,12.0,,75247,6164f785048360006aab8244,"Wed, 20 Apr 2016 13:59:50 -0400","

Thanks @raulsv, currently the student listing doesn't seem to sort by anything particularly meaningful. Unlike the instructor view, which is far cleverer!
@kyleblythe, I'm just thinking through a few scenarios and I think we'll need to clarify a few things before we jump in.

In the instructor view when categories are disabled, we use the sort order defined via the drag drop sorting and stored in the database gb_gradable_object_t.sort_order. So the ordering is generally defined by the instructor. Perhaps we should be honoring this sort order in the student view also?

To nail it down, are we looking to simply default to an alphabetical sort order for this student view? Or offer students the ability to sort the grade table and change between the default ordering and alphabetical ordering? It feels like a chronological order would be just as useful, perhaps based on 'Due date' or the time the grade was released.

The scenario above covers the 'No Categories' option. If categories are enabled, should we then alpha-sort the categories and then the items underneath?

",92100,557058:c7ed084d-c59c-4475-8ab7-81e1908270f0,"Thu, 21 Apr 2016 03:00:52 -0400","

Payten Giles @kyleblythe I'm thinking we just reuse whatever sort order the instructor has setup, so that they can arrange things how they want and know it will be the same for students. In fact I thought that was already the case but maybe I wasn't paying close attention :fearful:

",108809,557058:c7ed084d-c59c-4475-8ab7-81e1908270f0,"Thu, 28 Apr 2016 12:55:20 -0400","

I looked at this last night and it should be pretty trivial to use the same sort order as what the instructor has setup, which ideally is a global setting for the entire course (ie they have set it up to how it should be). The questions is whether or not it makes sense for a student to be able to sort it how they want to see it.

","Wed, 20 Apr 2016 17:59:50 +0000",,,,,,,,,,,125477,6164e7b0a707100069fd3655,"Thu, 28 Apr 2016 22:46:13 -0400","

The main purpose of this feature request is to allow the student to sort alphabetically automatically because the gradebook structure could be:

We discussed in GradebookNG call. We'll aim to implement sorting for the student as it currently exists in Gradebook 1.

,92101,6164f785048360006aab8244,"Sat, 4 Jun 2016 16:23:49 -0400","

Ah oops. I think the only thing remaining was the change to include the ""Group by Category"" toggle on the Grade Summary tab (the instructor view). Previously I'd only added this to the student view.

All the other bug fixes have been rolled in via different issues. I wonder if we can remove the priority tag now that it's behaving well and I can look into enhancing the instructor view once the other priority issues are completed? Does that seem ok @jeffpasch, @kyleblythe? Alternatively, maybe it'd be better to create a new issue for the enhancement and close out this one? There is one!
<a href=""https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-32919"" class=""jira-issue-macro-key issue-link""  title=""Student Drill Down should reflect category grouping of main gradebook"" >

",142202,6164f785048360006aab8244,"Wed, 20 Apr 2016 01:45:43 -0400","

@steveswinsburg, is there anything we can do push through a later version of GradebookNG to the 11.x branch?

[SAK-30878] Search Admin is not Morpheus-ready,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30878,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

Admin options in the Search tool are not Morpheus-ready. The tabbed link look is not implemented. Also, Selecting the Admin link takes over the browser window and all other Sakai navigation is lost.

column2: • Note that the ""Admin"" link at top is plain text and not a tab/button. Also note that Link and Help buttons overlap the horizontal rule.
• Tool content takes over the whole browser window and all other Sakai navigation is gone. Also, note that the links here are also plain text, not tabs.

[SAK-30875] default permissions are incorrect,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30875,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

On a new installation the people who can updated sites (maintainers/instructors) don't have permission to import calendars and subscribe to calendars by default. These features are reasonably well tested now and should be enabled by default. The permissions in question are:

calendar.subscribe

,107765,557058:5e9b51e2-3d91-4079-943a-ed719d119ea1,"Thu, 28 Apr 2016 01:19:18 -0400","

I believe the above are migration scripts (for MySQL), I also believe the we also need

INSERT INTO SAKAI_REALM_RL_FN VALUES((select REALM_KEY from SAKAI_REALM where REALM_ID = '!site.template'), (select ROLE_KEY from SAKAI_REALM_ROLE where ROLE_NAME = 'Instructor'), (select FUNCTION_KEY from SAKAI_REALM_FUNCTION where FUNCTION_NAME = 'calendar.subscribe'));

INSERT INTO SAKAI_REALM_RL_FN VALUES((select REALM_KEY from SAKAI_REALM where REALM_ID = '!site.template'), (select ROLE_KEY from SAKAI_REALM_ROLE where ROLE_NAME = 'Instructor'), (select FUNCTION_KEY from SAKAI_REALM_FUNCTION where FUNCTION_NAME = 'calendar.import'));
and probably another script for ""Teaching Assistant"" too (ie, substitute ""Teaching Assistant"" for ""Instructor"" above).
I'm also told that we will need to develop corresponding database initialisation scripts to effect the same changes on a clean install.

I'm afraid I'm not that clued up on this sort of thing.

",91086,557058:7074e357-325c-4f04-880f-321ecd7c7dc5,"Wed, 4 May 2016 03:52:54 -0400",

,"

are both set in !site.template for the 'maintain' role. Do this via the Realms tool in administration work space.

Check these 2 are NOT set for the access role.

,74287,557058:1126cb77-b601-4bf1-a169-76deaba72266,"Tue, 24 May 2016 05:25:45 -0400","

What's the reason for updating everyone's existing installations to allow maintainers/instructors to setup subscriptions and import calendars?
The issue says the default permissions are wrong, for which the fix is to change the SQL which is used when a new installation is created (this will mean the changes apply to nightly).

The description is about backfilling existing installation so that all users in existing sites now have this permission.

",91159,557058:1126cb77-b601-4bf1-a169-76deaba72266,"Tue, 24 May 2016 05:29:14 -0400",

[SAK-30873] RWiki: None of the students or instructors are able to see a picture uploaded by other student,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30873,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

Steps:
1. As student go to the RWiki tool.
2. Click the upload button from the text editor.
3. Upload an image (the only place where the student can upload an image is in ""My Workspace"" resources).

4. None of other students or instructors are able to see the image.

",,31901,SAK-30873,RWiki: None of the students or instructors are able to see a picture uploaded by other student,10007,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10303&avatarType=issuetype,Bug,10002,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/priorities/major.svg,Major,6,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/statuses/closed.png,"The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.",Closed,3,done,green,10002,Non-Issue,-1,Unassigned,6164e7b0a707100069fd3655,Raúl Sánchez Vegas,"Tue, 19 Apr 2016 06:29:54 -0400","Mon, 29 Aug 2016 07:21:40 -0400",11.0,Rwiki,0,2,Development,customfield_10000,com.atlassian.jira.plugins.jira-development-integration-plugin:devsummarycf,Rank,0|108zds:,customfield_10019,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-lexo-rank,Sprint,customfield_10020,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-sprint,"Tue, 26 Apr 2016 04:39:18 -0400",,,,,,,[CHART] Date of First Response,customfield_10024,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:firstresponsedate,[CHART] Time in Status,customfield_10025,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:timeinstatus,,,,,91025,557058:c5034e9d-3885-4f9c-b1d1-ae4bd6cdbfce,"Mon, 25 Apr 2016 05:46:00 -0400","

I do not see this behavior on trunk: students are able to embed an image or link into rwiki from their My Workspace > Resources, but other students/instructors viewing the wiki page are not able to view/access these.

Where was the problem behavior observed?

",107742,6164e7b0a707100069fd3655,"Mon, 25 Apr 2016 22:21:21 -0400","

Sorry, I typed a wrong sentence. The problem is that the other students/instructors are not able to view/access the picture uploaded by other student.

",107743,557058:c5034e9d-3885-4f9c-b1d1-ae4bd6cdbfce,"Tue, 26 Apr 2016 04:39:18 -0400","

Thanks for the clarification, Raul. This is expected (correct) behavior that rwiki is honoring permissions set in Resources. Thus, if a student sets the Public access permissions to files in My Workspace > Resources, then these public files/images will be viewable by instructors and students in rwiki. Otherwise, the files will not be viewable when they are not set to be publicly viewable.

","Mon, 25 Apr 2016 09:46:00 +0000",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,#11qatestfest,,,,12.0,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

[SAK-38798] copyright alert inconsistency between BaseContentService.java and Resources tool,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-38798,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

BaseContentService.java uses the following function to determine whether the copyright alert is on for given resource:
Note it checks for no-null value. So if the property value is set to be ""false"", the above logic will still set the copyright alert on for this resource
On the other hand, the ResourcesItem.java inside the Content module set copyright alert to be true ONLY when the above property value is not null AND equals to ""true"":

We had instances of resource files that do not show ""copyright alert"" icon in the Resource UI, but when user tries to access its content, Sakai shows the copyright alert page for it.

",,27553,SAK-38798,copyright alert inconsistency between BaseContentService.java and Resources tool,10007,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10303&avatarType=issuetype,Bug,10002,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/priorities/major.svg,Major,5,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/statuses/resolved.png,"A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. [SAK-32955] "Categories" TA permission dropdown should be disabled when "No Categories" are selected in Settings,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-32955,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

When you save TA permissions with a category selected, then change the GB's settings to ""No categories,"" the TA suddenly has view permission for ALL GB items.
1. The category dropdown should be disabled, frozen with ""All GB items"" displayed, or

2. Perhaps the ""Category"" dropdown gets replaced with an item-level dropdown, where permissions can be applied to individual GB items.

[SAK-30872] Calendar subscription message has duplicated and is missing parameters,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30872,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

On the Publish (Public) the 'subscription window' text is incorrect. (See screenshot.) The following message should be used.
The second half of the message is missing and the first part is duplicated. (NB: I may have got the {0} and {1} parameters the wrong way around!)

Subscription to this calendar in other applications will display all events within a window of plus {0} and minus {1} months. Authentication is not required and all events will potentially be visible to the general public. If this is not desirable then please publish via a private link instead.
On the Publish (private) page the (second) message in the properties file should be
Subscription to this calendar in other applications will display all events within a window of plus {0} and minus {1} months.
the screenshot (screenshot-2.png) shows the parameters are the wrong way around
The following two properties should be set in sakai properties, see INFRSTR-345
# Determine the range for calendar export
# Number of months from the past required in the export
# Number of months in the future required in the export

I wonder whether the code that reads string property then writes out the message isnt supplying parameters to be substituted?

[SAK-30871] elfinder, resources: Automatic Email notification sent to entire site EVERY TIME you upload a file via elFinder,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30871,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

Issue: Every time you upload a file to Resources via the elFinder, TWO automatic email notifications containing links to the newly uploaded file are sent to the entire site. There's no way to turn off these notifications.
Solution: elfinder should NEVER invoke a notification.

If you create a folder in Resources set to Hide this folder but allow access to its contents, and upload a file to it via elFinder, students can access the file via these links. This is a problem because the feature Hide this folder but allow access to its contents should be able to be used to store content (e.g. images) that an instructor embeds in an exam. Students should NOT have access to anything in a hidden folder that allows access to its contents other than by a link to an item in that folder which the instructor provides to the students.
(First 5 steps are to demonstrate why this is an issue for a hidden folder)

column2: • In a site with at least one student added, go to Resources, and select Actions > Create folders.
• Enter a Folder Name and click Add details for this item.
• Select the option Hide this folder but allow access to its contents.
• The folder should display as grayed out in the Resources list.
• Go to Samigo (or see below for an alternative)
• Either Edit an existing assessment OR under Create from Scratch, enter an Assessment Title and click Create.
• From the Insert New Question drop-down, select any type of question.
• Click the Show Rich-Text Editor (and character count) link above the Question Text box.
• Click the Image icon to add an image, then click Browse Server.
• Select the hidden folder you added. Click the Upload button and upload your file.
• Click OK and you'll see your lovely (not yet fully created) question with the image.

• Check the student's email box. Much to the instructor's dismay (if they knew), the student has received TWO emails with links to the image the instructor just put in the quiz question. The student can access the image via the links.
• Go to Resources and create HTML page
• opt to upload a file: Click the Upload button and upload your file.
• Check the student's email box. Much to the instructor's dismay (if they knew), the student has received TWO emails about the new file

column1:

Yeah, that sounds right, there's new code that handles this now.

In ContentSiteVolumeFactory it does a commitResource without a notification priority, which defaults to NotiifcationService.NOTI_OPTIONAL. I think if it's not going to be given as a choice in the UI, it should just be

NotificationService.NOTI_NONE in all of these cases.

Joda-Time is a date and time handling library that seeks to replace the JDK
Date and Calendar classes. For Java SE 8 and later, please use java.time instead.
This release contains one bug fix, a time-zone update and some minor internal changes.
The release runs on JDK 5 or later.
Joda-Time is licensed under the business-friendly Apache License Version 2.
This is the same license as all of Apache, plus other open source projects such as Spring.

[SAK-37438] Increase the character limit on titles,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-37438,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

Currently there is a 100 character limit on titles in lesson builder. However, in melete, the character limit was 255. Can this be upped to match the limit that was in melete? I've recently run into this limit in migrating content from melete to lessonbuilder.

",,53736,SAK-37438,Increase the character limit on titles,10012,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10315&avatarType=issuetype,Feature Request,10002,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/priorities/major.svg,Major,10025,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/statuses/generic.png,Indicates QA is complete and an issue has been tested and verified (Migrated on 12 Oct 2021 03:05 UTC),Verified,3,done,green,10000,Fixed,557058:4d4a9b66-a459-42c2-b5a3-95f6a9ab9086,Anirudh Nagulapalli,557058:e7a581dc-5f7e-491b-bb96-019cf349d01b,Kenneth Aragon,"Mon, 18 Apr 2016 13:06:52 -0400","Wed, 18 Apr 2018 03:24:09 -0400",11.0,Lessons,0,3,11 status,customfield_10122,com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.customfieldtypes:select,Conversion Script Required,,customfield_10040,com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.customfieldtypes:multicheckboxes,Development,customfield_10000,com.atlassian.jira.plugins.jira-development-integration-plugin:devsummarycf,"Tue, 19 Apr 2016 08:49:16 -0400",,,,10670,Yes,,Rank,customfield_10019,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-lexo-rank,Sprint,customfield_10020,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-sprint,,,11.0,11.2,107707,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,"Mon, 18 Apr 2016 13:43:48 -0400",

,191090,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,"Tue, 19 Apr 2016 08:56:51 -0400","

Note that I've checked the oracle update statements that were added in
with an Oracle server to make sure they have the right effect.

As always, everything in simplepage.for-11.sql should be in the Sakai database conversion scripts.

",40301,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,"Tue, 19 Apr 2016 09:28:25 -0400","

testing:
in 11, there are 3 places to be tested:
edit a link to a lesson, etc, changing the name
use the cog icon and edit the name of the page
upload a file, and specify the name in that dialog

In all cases, the UI should permit a 255 char name, and not allow you to type another character. A 255 char name should work, i.e. it should save and then display properly. (However the page design isn't intended to show names that long, so it may well produce line overflows.)

",0|108zag:,,,,,,,,,,,57299,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,"Tue, 19 Apr 2016 09:31:37 -0400","

Note by the way that both mysql and oracle declarations are characters, not bytes. (They are different for multi-byte UTF-8 characters.)

",107717,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,"Wed, 20 Apr 2016 08:35:16 -0400",

I looked more carefully at code that generates names. I don't think names that I generate are likely to get unreasonably long. So I'm going to let this patch stand without doing further work on name generation.

,57711,557058:4d4a9b66-a459-42c2-b5a3-95f6a9ab9086,"Thu, 22 Sep 2016 09:38:17 -0400",

Character limit is increased to 255. Tested on Trunk.

A bit of an annoyance though. Let's say you make a typo in the title adding in your RSS feed. The only way to change it is to remove and re-add it. I think this is worse than the Web Content one, where at least if you put the change in the Tool and Page fields, it will change for you.

",90993,557058:5e9b51e2-3d91-4079-943a-ed719d119ea1,"Mon, 18 Apr 2016 11:56:09 -0400","

agreed, it shouldnt be there. or be replaced by page title. Staff really dont understand the difference between the two so they will get muddled with this one

Hi there,

I'm doing some triage on 'morpheus' opened issues and I came across this one. I understand Laura's point and I must admit that I was really confused at the begining... but at the same time, the functionality is different from the 'sites dropdown'. In this case, the star is not clickable... I wonder what other people think.
We had some concerns about the hidden sites page but it was related to the checkboxes column... We'll address that on a different ticket.

Kyle Blythe Jeff Pasch Mark Triggs any thoughts? Thanks!

",74170,70121:24ac83d3-f5a7-4a57-be09-13263a37e0cd,"Wed, 27 Apr 2016 07:10:20 -0400","

Hi Jose Mariano Lujan and Laura Gekeler,

Hmm...I see your point. The greying-out of the stars in the ""Hidden Sites"" menu was intentional. Since the purpose of this screen is merely to hide sites, the stars themselves on this page are not functional. They just serve as a visual indicator that a site is favorited. As such, we did not want to use the yellow formatting for the stars on this screen, since we thought this might lend the impression that they were actionable.

I'm wondering if maybe a hover tooltip for these stars might be in order to help clarify this?

",194801,6164f961198b4f0068d443d3,"Tue, 20 Apr 2021 14:31:11 -0400","

Laura Gekeler, the link to the screencast in this jira is no longer functional. In 22.x at least, there is now a tooltip for the favorites star. Does this resolve the issue you were seeing?

","

column2: • As any user who is the member of several sites, navigate to the preferences tool (Home>Preferences)
• Hover over the grayed out star, check for tooltips

column1:
",Incorporate,,,,10006,,,,,,128129,557058:652d59a6-8d32-486e-8682-fa97a1afe06f,"Wed, 21 Apr 2021 05:55:33 -0400","

Thomas Kelsey Yes, the tooltip resolves the issue. 21.x should be tested as well, don't you think?

",94746,6164f961198b4f0068d443d3,"Wed, 21 Apr 2021 07:57:50 -0400","

Laura Gekeler, I'm realizing I don't think I actually know where the hidden sites menu is... There is a tooltip for the favorites star in the sites bar, and in the sites drop down menu, for 21.x and 22.x, but I'm not sure what ""hidden sites"" refers to.

",178117,557058:652d59a6-8d32-486e-8682-fa97a1afe06f,"Thu, 22 Apr 2021 04:48:43 -0400","

Thomas Kelsey Sure, by clicking on ones name in the upper righthand corner, the drop down menu contains ""Preferences"" (you can get to it other ways as well). In the Preferences screen one of the tabs is ""Sites""

[SAK-30855] CKEditor does not work if autosave plugin does not support system lang,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30855,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

When you deploy sakai 11 and your system (server or dabase) language, the autosave plugin returns an error that stops the CKEditor from working.
There is a comment at that line of the code (autosave/plugin.js) but it is not clear.
The images annonces-ckeditor.png, assignments-ckeditor.png and error.ckeditor-png describe the problem and solution-ckeditor1,2,3.png describe a solution.

It might need a better way to manage the I18N

",,,,,"

1/ Set up a forum, topic and conversation.,post a message to the conversation
3/ type some text, select it then click the ""chain link"" icon in the tool bar, select ""browse server"". Browse to the Forums tool in the current site and select a Forum. Click OK.

4/ type some more text, select it then click the ""chain link"" icon in the tool bar, select ""browse server"". Browse to the Forums tool in the current site enter a Forum then select a TOPIC. Clicdk OK and save
4/ save HTML page then click on it in resources.

[SAK-30846] remove the word "Sakai" from Tutorial,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30846,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

If the word Sakai is explicitly presented in the user interface then that means that all institutions that use a local name have to edit the tutorial. May I make a request to the ownrs of the Tutorial 'tool' that the word is not used.
It's perfectly possible to rephrase and either just miss out the word, ie, chnage
The Account Menu contains quick links to personal tasks, such as managing your account, creating new sites, and logging out of Sakai.
The Account Menu contains quick links to personal tasks, such as managing your account, creating new sites and logging out.

There's no need to mention which system is being logged out of - it's obvious.

",,31888,SAK-30846,"remove the word ""Sakai"" from Tutorial",10007,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10303&avatarType=issuetype,Bug,10002,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/priorities/major.svg,Major,10025,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/statuses/generic.png,Indicates QA is complete and an issue has been tested and verified (Migrated on 12 Oct 2021 03:05 UTC),Verified,3,done,green,10002,Non-Issue,-1,Unassigned,557058:5e9b51e2-3d91-4079-943a-ed719d119ea1,Adam Marshall,"Sun, 17 Apr 2016 03:25:59 -0400","Fri, 22 Apr 2016 10:38:54 -0400",11.0,Portal,0,2,Development,customfield_10000,com.atlassian.jira.plugins.jira-development-integration-plugin:devsummarycf,Rank,0|108z74:,customfield_10019,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-lexo-rank,Sprint,customfield_10020,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-sprint,"Mon, 18 Apr 2016 04:07:21 -0400",,,,,,,[CHART] Date of First Response,customfield_10024,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:firstresponsedate,[CHART] Time in Status,customfield_10025,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:timeinstatus,,,12.0,,191083,557058:cdae778f-fe7d-4a6d-9667-9be789e4fbee,"Mon, 18 Apr 2016 03:47:16 -0400","

The word ""Sakai"" only appears if you have not set ui.institituion to something other than ""Sakai"" in sakai.properties. As such, I think this is a non-issue and should be closed.

[SAK-36824] date picker can't change year or month,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-36824,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

The only reason I'm not calling this a blocker is that the same behavior exists in Sakai 10.

If you take an existing date and bring up the picker, you can change the hour, minute, or day, and things work fine. But if you change the month or year, it seems in the picker like you've changed them, but they aren't saved. You have to pick a day before the new values will save. What seems to be happening is that if you change the year or month, it clear the day, but not if you change the minute or how.

I think this is a bug, because you get into a situation where things like fine in the picker (the fact that the date is no longer set is nearly invisible), but they don't actually work.

","http://qa01-sakai.marist.edu:8080",62305,SAK-36824,date picker can't change year or month,10007,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10303&avatarType=issuetype,Bug,10001,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/priorities/critical.svg,Critical,5,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/statuses/resolved.png,"A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. Using the sakai 10 version of the date picker doesn't help. So something has changed in the environment, presumably jquery or jquery UI.

",174390,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,"Fri, 15 Apr 2016 10:12:57 -0400","

I guess this isn't a bug. I expected to be able to change the day, month and year separately. But if you change the year or month, nothing happens until to set a day. If you have the right date and want to change the year, nothing happens, because changing the year clears the day.

[SAK-30843] Changing gradebook item in forum does not change the data,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30843,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

Steps to replicate issue are:
1.For a forum click on “More” and select Grade.
2.On the top right corner of the page there is a dropdown for ""Select a Gradebook item"". Select a different item.

3.The page gets refreshed but it still displays the old data.

","Win 8.1,Chrome

Is this preventing the association of a Forum with a Gradebook item for grading?

,141221,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,"Thu, 12 May 2016 10:50:07 -0400",

When I tried it the screen displayed just fine. the problem is that when I went out and came back the item was no longer associated. It looks like the association with gradebook item wasn't saved to the database. It see this in 10 as well. Am I doing something wrong?

,157903,557058:f40ed6cf-0104-4dc6-88be-9f2bbc0cae39,"Thu, 12 May 2016 11:34:46 -0400","

Charles Hedrick I'm a little confused. What screen is not updating? The original ticket shows a statistics screen (Step3.png) in the Forums tool itself as part of the problem. I don't expect that screen to update as a result of gradebook associations. I also do not see grades entered in the forums statistics screen so I would not expect that any grades would be pushed to the Gradebook until grades have been manually entered in the Forums grading screen.

Am I focusing on the wrong problem?

","Wed, 27 Apr 2016 15:29:57 +0000",,,,,,25925,GradeItemSelected.png,140189,ug:043ac84d-4caa-406e-bd0a-eb836b736223,"Thu, 12 May 2016 11:52:51 -0400",174530,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,"Thu, 12 May 2016 11:44:04 -0400","

As far as I can tell the screen in the original report works fine. If I enter grades and click on Submit Grades it works fine. The problem is that if I go do something else and come back I have to select the gradebook item again. That's unlike any other tool, and risks errors.
There's a field in the database to store the gradebook associated with a forum. The associate is saved to the bean. But the routine to write the current setting to the database isn't called.

I'm seeing the same issue in 10. I asked my staff what was supposed to happen and they said after choosing the gradebook item I was supposed to hit ""save"", but I don't see a ""save."" I don't really expect to see one, since choosing the item causes the form to auto-submit.

But it seems to be working for other people in 10, because when I look at the database I see that the field is being set. I have no idea why it's not working for me.

",191219,557058:f40ed6cf-0104-4dc6-88be-9f2bbc0cae39,"Thu, 12 May 2016 11:53:10 -0400","

Charles Hedrick Okay, I get it. I don't think the Step3 image included in this ticket has anything to do with what you're talking about. It was throwing me off.

I just tested your scenario on marist and was able to choose a grade item, enter two grades, click Submit Grades, leave the screen, come back again, and the grade item I had chosen was still selected.

",40432,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,"Thu, 12 May 2016 11:55:39 -0400","

yes. but go to some different screen and come back, reselecting grading. Is the item still selected?

",57431,557058:f40ed6cf-0104-4dc6-88be-9f2bbc0cae39,"Thu, 12 May 2016 12:00:44 -0400","

Charles HedrickYep. I clicked all over the place, within the site, within Forums, came back, and that grade item was still selected. I even logged out and came back. Still there. May I add you to my site as an Instructor so you can try it? Just give me a username to add.

",91132,557058:f40ed6cf-0104-4dc6-88be-9f2bbc0cae39,"Fri, 13 May 2016 06:48:13 -0400","

Charles Hedrick I tested today and I was able to replicate the issue (finally!). I had to test on trunk (mysql) as the marist server started giving me errors.

What I found was that the forum's grade item in the grading screen will either a) change back to blank when you click away or b) switch back to the GB item you chose during the topic set-up. In both scenarios, you can temporarily select a different GB item to assign grades to, and successfully submit those grades to the GB, but once you click away and come back, the screen will default to whatever GB item was chosen from the Topic Settings screen. If none is chosen on the topic settings screen, there will be no GB item shown when you open the grading screen.

Is this expected behavior? A feature or a bug?

[SAK-30839] When duplicating a site always remove a provider ID,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30839,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

We have some project sites with a provider ID set. Currently when site-info duplicates a site it removes any provider IDs from a course site, but it doesn't do this for a project site. This check doesn't need to be there as it should always remove provider IDs.

This makes sense because user memberships aren't copied across when duplicating a site, so neither should provider IDs.

1-Create a site ""SMPL101 Spring 2016"" with two groups ""Discussion 1 SMPL101"" and ""Discussion 2 SMPL101"". Add Roster tool.
2-Once created the site go to the Roster tool.
4-No matches appear, the full list appears.

3-Search ""The instruc"", appears 3 matches (""The instructor"",""The instructor1"",""The instructor2"").
4-If I click ""The instructor"" should match the three occurrences, but only ""The instructor"" appears in search.
1-Create a site ""SMPL101 Spring 2016"" with two groups ""Discussion 1 SMPL101"" and ""Discussion 2 SMPL101"". Add Roster tool.
2-Once created the site go to the Roster tool.
3-Search something that does not match any user from the list.

5-It should appears a text announcing that they have found no matches, but the full list appears

[SAK-30832] When adding participants to site, if multiple matches occur EID is shown instead of display ID,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30832,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

If you search for a user by email address and multiple users match you are asked to add one by EID instead, in all other places Site Info uses display ID. So when users see EID they get confused. We should show display ID here.

For deployments that don't use display IDs they are the same as the EID so no difference will be seen.

,157768,6164d3a564ff010071b75c26,"Tue, 19 Apr 2016 05:21:36 -0400","

Testing:
need a set of pools where one has a subpool and the subpool has a subpool
n the question pool list, a pool with subpools should show with a widget and closed folder icon.
Click om it, the widgets should change.
Make sure that the subpool also has the widgets and them control the subsubpool.
Choose ""copy pool"" under one of the other pools (not the one with subplots)
You'll now get a pool selector screen. The pool with subpools should have widgets, and it and its subpool should behave correctly when they are toggled.

This fix also affects ""share pool."" The fix causes the ""share"" button to be disabled until the user clicks a user to add or remove. At that point the button is enabled. Before the fix is starts out enabled.

[SAK-30828] Normalize Sakai logging,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30828,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

Sakai has a mix of logging libraries, mostly
The catalina.out log is mess because of all the different logging facilities and their different formats.

SLF4J was a good start as it is similar to JCL which abstracts the logging implementation so that someone could easily switch to a different logging implementation. The most notable reason why slf4j is a better choice is because of class loader issues. EntityBroker had much of its logging (JCL) removed due to class loader issues http://articles.qos.ch/classloader.html
As a way forward for new code using slf4j annotation:
Whether to use a static or instance member of the Logger are both fine see http://www.slf4j.org/faq.html#declared_static
We will always need JCL support due to many libraries requiring JCL like spring. Therefore using jcl-over-slf4j is needed for those libraries.
Lastly I am proposing a change the sakai appender's pattern to match the logger output of tomcat-juli so that the log4j and tomcat-juli look the same giving a consistent logging experience.
Lastly its worth noting that external libraries that output System.out will continue to do so like genericdao and rsf. These libraries are deprecated and should be avoided in the future.
Please see this link for examples of performance and logging http://www.slf4j.org/faq.html#logging_performance
For example: (1st line is traditional logging, 2nd line is updated for slf4j)
if (logger.isDebugEnabled()) logger.debug(""Log parameters One: ""+one+"", and Two:""+two);
logger.debug(""Log parameters One: {}, and Two: {}"", one, two);

This doesn't mean that older method is not useful in certain situations but it does simplify the logging. Also another advantage is null params are printed as the word ""null"" in the replacement, instead of throwing NPE.

",,23064,SAK-30828,Normalize Sakai logging,10007,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10303&avatarType=issuetype,Bug,10002,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/priorities/major.svg,Major,6,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/statuses/closed.png,"The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. [SAK-30826] Syllabus CKEditor captures the rendered HTML rather than preserving the user input,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30826,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

When testing the LaTeX support (Mathjax) in Syllabus I discovered that if I create a new item with some simple LaTeX, like $$\pi$$, and then edit the item after Mathjax has rendered it, the CKEditor will grab all the markup that Mathjax has added for rendering and treat it as part of the input, and the formula will appear as rendered rather than the original LaTeX. This makes it very difficult to edit the formula later.

Other tools using the CKEditor do not do this, and will show the original LaTeX, not a rendered version.

[SAK-30825] Tool title can be set but is never displayed,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30825,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

In Sakai 10 , when an instructor edits the Web Content tool, the Page Title and the Tool title control two different display elements, a title at the top of the page and the button name (Tool).

In Sakai 11, I suspect this is lost with the new Breadcrumbs feature. Now if you put in different values in the Page Title and Tool title, only the Page title gets picked up and is used for the Tool Title and the Breadcrumb (which replaced the Page title).
1) Get rid of the Tool title
2) Rename the Page Title to Tool title.
3) Put two different words or phrases in the Tool Title and the Page Title.
Notice that Tool title is not used.
IMO that is okay, as long as we remove the Tool title option.

And I think users will connect more easily with the label of Tool title than Page title, so I recommend a renaming of the Page title (which would be kept).

",,49418,SAK-30825,Tool title can be set but is never displayed,10017,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10318&avatarType=issuetype,Task,10003,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/priorities/minor.svg,Minor,10000,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/statuses/generic.png,"Issue has been created but has not yet been reviewed and validated, should not be worked on yet (Migrated on 12 Oct 2021 03:05 UTC)",Awaiting Review,2,new,blue-gray,-1,Unresolved,6164d8abc7bea400699b1b9e,Core Team,557058:7074e357-325c-4f04-880f-321ecd7c7dc5,Neal Caidin,"Thu, 14 Apr 2016 10:02:49 -0400","Wed, 27 Apr 2016 00:57:06 -0400",11.0,Web Content,0,2,Development,customfield_10000,com.atlassian.jira.plugins.jira-development-integration-plugin:devsummarycf,Rank,0|108z1c:,customfield_10019,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-lexo-rank,Sprint,customfield_10020,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-sprint,,,,,,,,[CHART] Date of First Response,customfield_10024,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:firstresponsedate,,,,,,,,74113,557058:5e9b51e2-3d91-4079-943a-ed719d119ea1,"Sat, 16 Apr 2016 12:57:16 -0400",

[SAK-30816] Add the ability to add attachments into the "Add Item" pop up box in the Syllabus Tool,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30816,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

In the syllabus tool it is not clear to the instructor when they click add item that attachments can be added at all. The following steps have to happen to add an attachment:
1. They must open the add item dialog
2. They enter a title and optional description. I suspect that at this point instructors may close the window, thinking there is another place to add a file.
3. Expand the item. This is not particularly obvious.

If there is an add attachment option in the add item pop up box I think it will be much more intuitive for instructors to do the common task of adding pdf or doc files

[SAK-30815] announcements: When reordering, beginning/ending dates don't display even though you can sort by beginning/ending date.,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30815,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

New in Sakai 11, the Reorder Announcements screen allows you to click Sort by beginning date and Sort by ending date. However, the only date displayed is the modified date. The sort order doesn't really make sense without the beginning and ending dates shown.

column2: • Check the boxes next to Beginning and Ending (default dates are fine).
• Under Availability, specify both a Beginning and Ending date that are DIFFERENT from the dates for the last assignment, and post the announcement.
• Add a third announcement; do NOT specify either beginning or ending dates; allow it to post immediately.

• Click Sort by beginning date. The Announcements that have beginning dates entered should be listed at the top, with the one that has the earliest beginning date at the top (an up arrow icon should display to the right of the Sort by beginning date link).

• Click Sort by beginning date. Announcements that have a beginning date entered should be listed at the top, with the one that has the latest beginning date first (a down arrow icon should display to the right of the Sort by beginning date link).

• Click Sort by ending date. Announcements that have an ending date entered should be listed at the top, with the one that has the earliest ending date at the top (an up arrow icon should display to the right of the Sort by ending date link).

• Click Sort by ending date. Announcements that have an ending date entered should be listed at the top, with the one that has the latest ending date first (a down arrow icon should display to the right of the Sort by ending date link).

column1:

From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.",Resolved,3,done,green,10000,Fixed,5a8239916a4cf333658aebcf,Bryan Holladay,5a8239916a4cf333658aebcf,Bryan Holladay,"Thu, 14 Apr 2016 03:34:51 -0400","Wed, 23 May 2018 05:25:15 -0400",,Content-Review (SVN Module),0,3,Development,customfield_10000,com.atlassian.jira.plugins.jira-development-integration-plugin:devsummarycf,Rank,0|108yyo:,customfield_10019,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-lexo-rank,Sprint,customfield_10020,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-sprint,"Tue, 19 Apr 2016 04:12:34 -0400",,,,,,,[CHART] Date of First Response,customfield_10024,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:firstresponsedate,[CHART] Time in Status,customfield_10025,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:timeinstatus,,,,,126366,557058:d4bf1967-6188-4b29-bf4a-95cf874b4a08,"Tue, 22 May 2018 09:50:39 -0400","

This changed the way VeriCite worked, after this patch the VeriCite provider now queues the content with the ContentReviewQueueService (meaning it is persisted to the database). There maybe a needs for a migration (SQL) for those who were using VeriCite previous to this this.
Also after this patch you will need to run the Process Content Review Queue Job regularly but you don't need to run the Process Content Review Reports Job as it is currently not used by VeriCite.

",143068,557058:e7a581dc-5f7e-491b-bb96-019cf349d01b,"Tue, 22 May 2018 15:05:44 -0400","

I came up with a query to populate the contentreview_item table with data from pre Sakai 12 :

insert into contentreview_item (contentId, userId, siteId, taskId, externalId, dateQueued, dateSubmitted, dateReportReceived, status, reviewScore, lastError, retryCount, nextRetryTime, errorCode, PROVIDERID, VERSION)

select substring(asa.attachment,9), ass.submitter, aa.context, concat('/assignment/a/',aa.context,'/',aa.assignment_id), null, '2018-05-22 00:00:00', null, null, '1', null, null, null, '2018-05-22 00:00:00', null, '1930781763', '0'
left join asn_assignment aa on aa.assignment_id=asub.assignment_id
left join asn_submission_attachments asa on asa.submission_id=asub.submission_id
left join asn_submission_submitter ass on ass.submission_id=asub.submission_id
where aa.content_review=true and asa.attachment is not null

The above works when a client that has only used Vericite.  There are many cases where someone has used Turnitin and then moved to Vericite or ran with both enabled.  Will need to think about this as well.

",76125,557058:d4bf1967-6188-4b29-bf4a-95cf874b4a08,"Wed, 23 May 2018 05:25:15 -0400","

I think when someone switches providers it was never customary to reprocess those processed by a different provider.
Given that there are (now) many providers, it may seem reasonable for institutions to want to run multiple providers in the same site?
If true, Content Review is evolving and we would need a good plan moving forward!

[SAK-30804] Statistics Tool - Reports - Printing View,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30804,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

Statistics Tool - Reports
Create Report (must include table and chart)
Click on name of report to run it
Click ""Printable Version"" in top right hand corner
Click ""Send to Printer"" in top left hand corner
Inspect format of table and chart
The table and chart that are printed out are overlapping - https://drive.google.com/open?id=0ByEcMWGd1pPHek5USHMtUE9pRE0
this does not happen when a single table, or single chart is printed, only the combination of the two.
This happens when sending to an actual printer, and printing to a pdf (adobepdf option or save as pdf option in print menu)

This does not happen when using the export to pdf option, as that does not export the chart with it.

","Windows 8

[SAK-30802] "Import from Site" does not include Site Information (Home page),https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30802,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

The ""Site Information"" widget, accessible from the Home tool, is encouraged for use by instructors to promote course information with embedded videos, formatted text, urls, etc. It is an important feature in course design and implementation.
Site Information"" is also accessible in the ""Site Info"" tool and can be edited there.

When the site information is crafted by the instructors carefully, they expect to reuse it in future courses. However, in Sakai 2.9, 10, 11, the Site Information widget cannot be imported from source site to the new site using ""Import from Site"" function in ""Site Info"" tool.

It not only discourages the use of Home tool and frustrates instructors who do use site info in Home tool. I think that's part of the reason why Oxford has tried to add synoptic widgets to the Lessons tool. Although it will help the design and distribution of site information, many instructors find Lessons tool too complex or intimidating and prefer using the Home tool.
""Duplicate site"" can duplicate the site information, but is not used by institutions who pre-populate each term's course shells. ""Import from Site"" is used instead.

h2. **Recommendation: add ""site information"" or ""home"" tool to the list of tools which can be imported from the source site to the new site *

","Sakai 2.9, Sakai 10 and Sakai 11 (http://qa01-sakai.marist.edu:8080/portal/)",23057,SAK-30802,"""Import from Site"" does not include Site Information (Home page)",10012,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10315&avatarType=issuetype,Feature Request,10003,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/priorities/minor.svg,Minor,5,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/statuses/resolved.png,"A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. [SAK-30801] Increase size of content review comment and add warning when over,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30801,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

As noted on the dev list (https://groups.google.com/a/apereo.org/forum/#!topic/sakai-dev/SH-AF1WBHes), the size of

ASN_PEER_ASSESSMENT_ITEM_T -> REVIEW_COMMENT is only 6000 characters. I'm not sure why this limit is this low (when varchar in MySQL goes to 65535) but I'm pretty sure we can increase it at least that high easily. But there also should be a warning if you hit that limit and it can't save.

[SAK-30799] Access permissions in resources are cached when not appropiate,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30799,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

It would appear that permissions on a file are cached and are not reset when circumstances change. There are two sceanrios

1/ person cannot see a file that they have just been give permission to view. Scenario: student is given a link to a file, they click on the link and see a permission denied message, they contact their tutor to complain, the tutor realises that the student isnt in the site subgroup so adds them, the student tries again and still cant see the file. This is caused by the permissions being cached. If the student tries again in 10 mins or so it will work just fine.
2/ Student downloads a file and then the permission is changed, they can still download it for a short while.
On a site where access user student01 has standard permissions, eg, cannot see hidden or group protected files, create a folder & add HTML file & JPG
As instructor protect folder by group1 which student01 isnt a member of.
soon after doing this try to view JPG as student - permission denied = CORRECT
try to view HTML file - you can = NOT CORRECT
use a different browser & try to access HTML file as student01 , you can.

this on marist QA01 & nightly

",,53777,SAK-30799,Access permissions in resources are cached when not appropiate,10007,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10303&avatarType=issuetype,Bug,10002,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/priorities/major.svg,Major,1,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/statuses/open.png,The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.,Open,2,new,blue-gray,-1,Unresolved,6164d8abc7bea400699b1b9e,Core Team,557058:5e9b51e2-3d91-4079-943a-ed719d119ea1,Adam Marshall,"Wed, 13 Apr 2016 07:24:06 -0400","Wed, 27 Apr 2016 11:18:41 -0400",10.6,Content,0,3,Development,customfield_10000,com.atlassian.jira.plugins.jira-development-integration-plugin:devsummarycf,Rank,0|108yuw:,customfield_10019,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-lexo-rank,Sprint,customfield_10020,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-sprint,,,,,,,,Test Plan,customfield_10038,com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.customfieldtypes:textarea,[CHART] Date of First Response,customfield_10024,com.atlassian.jira.ext.charting:firstresponsedate,,,,,191073,557058:5e9b51e2-3d91-4079-943a-ed719d119ea1,"Wed, 13 Apr 2016 10:13:16 -0400",

Cache problem?

,57280,557058:5e9b51e2-3d91-4079-943a-ed719d119ea1,"Wed, 13 Apr 2016 10:30:44 -0400","

I wonder whether this is a known issue. It seems that if a person has downloaded a file and then the permission is changed, they can still download it for a short while. But that's kind of OK as they've already got the file.

I'm not sure what happens if the file is changed - can they still download the changed version for a while? That would be more serious.

",174384,70121:ec0fd122-4a2d-4492-a966-78d3f9aa9080,"Wed, 13 Apr 2016 13:41:16 -0400","

Yeah, I'm pretty sure this is lack of cache invalidation. The standard time for these caches are 10 minutes for this cache and it's probably not invalidating it. It sounds like this was something Matthew Buckett noted as not working right in
<a href=""https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-38861"" class=""jira-issue-macro-key issue-link""  title=""Remove deprecated use of MultiRefCache"" >

.

","

#1 On a site where access user student01 has standard permissions, eg, cannot see hidden or group protected files, create a folder & add HTML file & JPG
As instructor protect folder by group1 which student01 isnt a member of.
make sure niether files can be seen

[SAK-30798] Assignments - Previous Ungraded button not functioning.,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30798,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

The Previous Ungraded button is not functioning properly (taking you to the previous ungraded student) nor is it displaying as inactive when there are no previous ungraded students to grade.

column2: • In a site with at least 4 students, create and post an assignment with the following settings: Grade Scale = Points, a point value entered in points field and Add Assignment to Gradebook enabled.
• Click the Grade link under the assignment title.
• Enter a grade and comments on Student01's grade screen.
• As Instructor, click Grade link under assignment title.
• Click link for Student02. The Previous Ungraded button should be inactive since Student01 was already graded. Clicking on the button does nothing. (screenshot attached)
• Click Next Ungraded button. This should put you on the grade page for Student03.
• Click Previous Ungraded button. Expected behavior is to return you to Student02's grade page but nothing happens.

column1: Tested in the following browsers - FF 44.0.2, IE 11 and Safari 9.0.1",49406,SAK-30798,Assignments - Previous Ungraded button not functioning.,10007,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/secure/viewavatar?size=medium&avatarId=10303&avatarType=issuetype,Bug,10002,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/priorities/major.svg,Major,1,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/images/icons/statuses/open.png,The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.,Open,2,new,blue-gray,-1,Unresolved,6164d8abc7bea400699b1b9e,Core Team,5fbe10182730d80076a6a394,Michele Irvine,"Wed, 13 Apr 2016 07:12:29 -0400","Mon, 2 May 2016 22:14:01 -0400",11.0,Assignments,0,1,Development,customfield_10000,com.atlassian.jira.plugins.jira-development-integration-plugin:devsummarycf,Rank,0|108yuo:,customfield_10019,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-lexo-rank,Sprint,customfield_10020,com.pyxis.greenhopper.jira:gh-sprint,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,44964,previousungradedbuttonactive.jpg,51391,ug:11dbc09f-cea8-47d6-90cd-bc759d665348,"Wed, 13 Apr 2016 07:06:58 -0400",,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,#11qatestfest,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

,191166,70121:24ac83d3-f5a7-4a57-be09-13263a37e0cd,"Mon, 2 May 2016 08:47:28 -0400","

We have noticed this in relation to the tool order screen in 11, and do not believe this was an issue in 10.x.
Current screenshot in 11:
10.x maintenance branch:
It looks like the code was introduced for 11.x and doesn’t seem to take into account that some tools don’t set the `functions.require` configuration. For example, for the Resource tool:
However, the Assignment tool doesn’t have a similar entry:
The problem code is here https://github.com/sakaiproject/sakai/blob/master/site-manage/pageorder/tool/src/java/org/sakaiproject/site/tool/helper/order/impl/SitePageEditHandler.java#L469:

Basically, all those checks in the final line need to be false. So the permissions can’t be empty and permissions shouldn’t contain SITE_UPD or SITE_VISIT.

",109307,557058:f40ed6cf-0104-4dc6-88be-9f2bbc0cae39,"Wed, 6 Dec 2017 08:24:08 -0500","

Opening this issue. It's been stagnant for over a year without resolution, and still seems to be an issue in https://qa2-us.nightly.sakaiproject.org

","Wed, 27 Apr 2016 15:03:29 +0000",Duplicate,27835,SAK-33454,duplicates,10002,41856,10 tool order.png,135081,ug:0e5719a1-8718-42cd-827d-ab35572eee45,"Mon, 2 May 2016 08:45:03 -0400",192713,557058:1fab5062-c88f-4d13-b5c9-a1e08a1b6779,"Tue, 9 Jan 2018 08:11:32 -0500","

I suspect we're running into this issue after a recent upgrade from 10.7 to 11.4. I'm not totally sure, but if a tool (e.g. Discussions and Private Messages (jforum) was 'locked' in 10.7 after we upgraded to 11.4, the lock/unlock icon is no longer displayed, so it can't be unlocked.

[SAK-30793] Events created using Frequency settings show event date as original creation date,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30793,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

If Frequency settings are used creating an event, the later events will show the creation date in details.

If an event is created Weds., April 13 with frequency repeating every Mon./Weds./Fri., the Apr. 15th Friday event appears with details showing the date as April 13th. Clicking the event Friday and changing the date to the 15th, saving, viewing event details: now listed as the 14th.

column2: • Find the event on a future date, click title to view details

column1:

I dug through and found the file that causes the issue is calendartool/tool/CalendarAction.java. Seems easy enough to tackle so I assigned it to myself.

,124873,557058:718cd3f6-5ff9-42fa-8914-b4224aff1730,"Tue, 8 Nov 2016 02:05:29 -0500","

Hunter - this one is a bit tricky. Take a look at the link under the month view versus the link under the week view. The week view has additional stuff about the position of the item within the sequence using exclamation points. This is parsed and handled in

But I have not yet tracked either (a) why the rest of the views generate what seems to be the wrong link and (b) how BaseCalendarService parses and fixes the firstTime() information for the right date would be displayed. I was digging through the findEvent() method in BaseCalendarService when I had to stop.. So those are just clues.

",74636,557058:718cd3f6-5ff9-42fa-8914-b4224aff1730,"Wed, 9 Nov 2016 01:49:45 -0500","

Here are some sample links with the ""place within sequence"" indications:

These come in the Week View and not in the monthly view. But even when the links seem right in the week view, the detail view still shows the first date.

","Fri, 4 Nov 2016 22:55:44 +0000",Depend,,,,10007,,,,,,141997,557058:718cd3f6-5ff9-42fa-8914-b4224aff1730,"Thu, 13 Jul 2017 20:53:44 -0400",

I think this bug was introduced by SAK-23076

,58191,557058:718cd3f6-5ff9-42fa-8914-b4224aff1730,"Fri, 14 Jul 2017 05:19:44 -0400",

It looks as though this was introduced by an incorrect fix to SAK-23076 - the problem is actually in the TimeRange duration() implementation that mistakenly fudges the first and last time when computing the duration.

,125276,557058:718cd3f6-5ff9-42fa-8914-b4224aff1730,"Fri, 14 Jul 2017 11:58:50 -0400","

This is fixed by reverting
<a href=""https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-23076"" class=""jira-issue-macro-key issue-link""  title=""If event reoccurs, time is off by 1 minute"" >
<a href=""https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-38927"" class=""jira-issue-macro-key issue-link""  title=""Fix TimeRange.duration() to use non-fudged start end end times"" >

[SAK-30792] Assignments - Return to List button not functional on student's Peer Review page.,https://sakaiproject.atlassian.net/browse/SAK-30792,10057,SAK,Sakai,"

On the student's Peer Review page, the Return to List button at the bottom of the page is not functional (attached screenshot).

column2: • As an instructor, create and post an assignment with Peer Assessment enabled.
• Enter a value > 1 in the Number of submissions students must review field.
• As a student, click the Student 1 link to review a peer's submission (once review period has begun).
• Enter a grade and/or comment in the fields provided.
• Scroll to bottom of review page and click Return to List. Nothing happens? This is not the case for the same button found towards the top of the page.
